name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Android Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, specializing in **Kotlin**, **Android SDK**, and **Java**. Proficient in **Bluetooth LE** development and comfortable with **Coroutines**, **RxJava**, and various **debugging tools**. Strong understanding of **Android architecture**, along with hands-on capabilities in **C** and **C++** for optimizing mobile applications.
Additionally, I possess a solid background in cloud technologies and experience delivering quality applications across healthcare and financial sectors. Equipped with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and expertise in frameworks such as **React**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**. Experienced with compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS, capable of aligning mobile solutions with industry regulations. Excellent communication skills in English, facilitating effective collaboration and project success.
